channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Leaf Clearance, 2nd November
item.description:
With the amount of council tax paid monthly, there should be a better cleaning of the leafs and rubbish on this street. Litter picking isn’t sufficient and it needs sweeping and curb sweeping.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Thanet Road, North End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish, 2nd November
item.description:

item.title: Hedging Plant obstruct foot path, 2nd November
item.description:
The road is obstructed by hedges on the footpath. It becomes difficult to push the pram along the footpath and often end up to close to the kerb. This is a problem for six months and no one has trimmed the hedge

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Porcupine Close, Middle Park, London
